price: Ɔde nokorε no na abͻ soro ne asaase, Ɔyε Okokuroko korͻn paa kyεn deε wͻde bata Ne ho no.
arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ تَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqi taʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
